name: Incremental Cubes [Prototype3]
description:
Please mast Read!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

bugs

The button in the upper left corner that allows you to purchase multiple items
at once seems to have a bug. Please purchase one item at a time.

Buying a fastertick after leveling up a cube slows it down, but this is a bug where the process of recalculating the cube when you level it up is not happening. We apologize for this.
